name: Pizza Please
description:
It’s very simple to become the king of pizza delivery. You just need to get rich delivering pizzas. But in order to earn fat stacks, you must deliver pizzas super speedy, and holding down the gas pedal is a good way to total your car, so consider braking occasionally. But once you learn how to go fast properly, and start saving some money, you can make your car faster. Rinse and repeat until you’re sitting on a throne of pizza boxes, and then you will be crowned the all-mighty king of pizza delivery.

Use the arrow keys to accelerate and steer. Space to brake.

Project made for our Production Methodologies class.

Bobby Villeneuve (Designer/Modeler)
